an10.70:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an10.70:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanta upatthanasalayam sannisinna sannipatita anekavihitam tiracchanakatham anuyutta viharanti, seyyathidam—
an10.70:1.3: rajakatham corakatham mahamattakatham …pe… itibhavabhavakatham iti vati.
an10.70:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attana ca appiccho hoti, appicchakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:2.4: ‘Appiccho bhikkhu appicchakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:3.1: Attana ca santuttho hoti, santutthikathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:3.2: ‘Santuttho bhikkhu santutthikathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:4.1: Attana ca pavivitto hoti, pavivekakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:4.2: ‘Pavivitto bhikkhu pavivekakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:5.1: Attana ca asamsattho hoti, asamsatthakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:5.2: ‘Asamsattho bhikkhu asamsatthakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:6.1: Attana ca araddhaviriyo hoti, viriyarambhakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:6.2: ‘Araddhaviriyo bhikkhu viriyarambhakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:7.1: Attana ca silasampanno hoti, silasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:7.2: ‘Silasampanno bhikkhu silasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:8.1: Attana ca samadhisampanno hoti, samadhisampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:8.2: ‘Samadhisampanno bhikkhu samadhisampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:9.1: Attana ca pannasampanno hoti, pannasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:9.2: ‘Pannasampanno bhikkhu pannasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:10.1: Attana ca vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttisampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:10.2: ‘Vimuttisampanno bhikkhu vimuttisampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:11.1: Attana ca vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti, vimuttinanadassanasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta hoti.
an10.70:11.2: ‘Vimuttinanadassanasampanno bhikkhu vimuttinanadassanasampadakathanca bhikkhunam katta’ti pasamsametam thanam.
an10.70:12.1: Imani kho, bhikkhave, dasa pasamsani thanani”ti.
